Package ServerSide

Class NetworkConnection

java.lang.Object
ServerSide.NetworkConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseSource
public class NetworkConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseSource
The core SQL commands to construct the database and where the DatabaseSource interface methods are defined.
Author:
Alistair Ridge, Johnny Madigan and Scott Peachey

    void addUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String unit, boolean access)
    Method used to add a user to the database but using POLYMORPHISM (method overloading) Like the method above, this method explicitly defines a user's unit when adding to the database

    • CREATE_USERS_TABLE

      public static final java.lang.String CREATE_USERS_TABLE
      These are the generic SQL statements that will have an objects information added to it before being passed over the network stream. Included are statements used to setup the database tables to allow for simple deployment.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • resetEverything

      public void resetEverything()

    • login

      public User login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws DoesNotExist, IllegalString
      Method used when a user attempts to log in. Uses the username to get the user from the database, then hash the input password with that user's salt to see if there's a match.
      Specified by:
      login in interface DatabaseSource
      Parameters:
      username - username input
      password - password input
      Returns:
      the user object for the log-in session
      Throws:
      DoesNotExist - Throw an exception if the user does not exist
      IllegalString - Throw an exception if the password is not a valid string

    • getUser

      public User getUser​(java.lang.String name) throws DoesNotExist
      Method used to get the data for a specified user from the database
      Specified by:
      getUser in interface DatabaseSource
      Parameters:
      name - username of user to get
      Returns:
      a User object that holds all the users data
      Throws:
      DoesNotExist - Throw an exception if the user does not exist

    • addUser

      public void addUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, boolean access) throws IllegalString, AlreadyExists
      Method used to add a user to the User table in the database As methods should be single-purposed, the user will be added to a unit in the usersUnit() method
      Specified by:
      addUser in interface DatabaseSource
      Parameters:
      username - user's unique username
      password - password the user will use to login
      access - admin access for the user
      Throws:
      IllegalString - Throw an exception if the password is not a valid string
      AlreadyExists - Throw an exception if the user already exists

    • addUser

      public void addUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String unit, boolean access) throws IllegalString, AlreadyExists
      Method used to add a user to the database but using POLYMORPHISM (method overloading) Like the method above, this method explicitly defines a user's unit when adding to the database
      Specified by:
      addUser in interface DatabaseSource
      Parameters:
      username - user's unique username
      password - password the user will use to login
      access - admin access for the user
      unit - The unit that the user belongs to
      Throws:
      IllegalString - Throw an exception if the password is not a valid string
      AlreadyExists - Throw an exception if the user already exists

      public void removeUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Method to remove a user's data from the database
      Specified by:
      removeUser in interface DatabaseSource
      Parameters:
      username - user to delete

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws DoesNotExist, IllegalString
      Method used by any logged in user to change their own password in the database. The same method will be used for admins to change any user's password in the database.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface DatabaseSource
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user's password to change
      password - password we want to change it to
      Throws:
      DoesNotExist - Throw an exception if the user does not exist
      IllegalString - Throw an exception if the password is not a valid string

    • updateUsersUnit

      public void updateUsersUnit​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String unit) throws DoesNotExist
      Method used by admins to update a user's unit in the database.
      Specified by:
      updateUsersUnit in interface DatabaseSource
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user's unit to change
      unit - unit we want to change it to
      Throws:
      DoesNotExist - Throw exception if the user does not exist

    • getOrders

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Order> getOrders()
      Method used to get a list of all outstanding orders in the order table of the database.
      Specified by:
      getOrders in interface DatabaseSource
      Returns:
      A HashMap in the form of (OrderID, Order) where Order is the order object for the OrderID entry in the order table of the database

      Adds a unit to the database
      Specified by:
      addUnit in interface DatabaseSource
      Parameters:
      orgName - The unit that is being added to the database
      balance - The initial balance of the unit
      Throws:
      IllegalString - if unit name contains numbers, special character or spaces
      AlreadyExists - if the unit name is already in the database

    • addAssetToUnit

      public void addAssetToUnit​(java.lang.String unitname, int balance, int assetID, int assetqty) throws AlreadyExists, DoesNotExist
      Add an existing asset from the database to a unit
      Specified by:
      addAssetToUnit in interface DatabaseSource
      Parameters:
      unitname - the unit to add an asset to
      balance - the units new credit balance
      assetID - the asset which will be added to the unit
      assetqty - the quantity of the asset
      Throws:
      AlreadyExists - if the asset is already held by the unit
      DoesNotExist - if the asset does not exist
